Posted By: SteZiL (6/25/2012 3:08:33 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I suppose you could use this to have some sort of discard engine in reanimation, but what's wrong with [Putrid Imp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Putrid Imp)? While I'm at it, I'll make a pros/cons chart between these two:  
  
Face of Fear:  
  
PRO   
- Power and Toughness are better  
- Offensively, Fear is better than Flying  
  
CON   
- Lower Rarity  
- CMC is cheaper  
- Discarding is free  
- Defensively, Flying is better than Fear  
- Has Threshold  
- Is a Zombie Imp, a better creature type than Horror  
  
Do I need to go any further? This is a... 'putrid' card (HAHAHAHA GET IT?!)
posts.html:
I suppose you could use this to have some sort of discard engine in reanimation, but what's wrong with Putrid Imp? While I'm at it, I'll make a pros/cons chart between these two:

Face of Fear:

PRO
- Power and Toughness are better
- Offensively, Fear is better than Flying

CON
- Lower Rarity
- CMC is cheaper
- Discarding is free
- Defensively, Flying is better than Fear
- Has Threshold
- Is a Zombie Imp, a better creature type than Horror

Do I need to go any further? This is a... 'putrid' card (HAHAHAHA GET IT?!)
